Class GeoVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeoVector
  • public class GeoVector
extends java.lang.Object
    A geometric, two-dimensional, Euclidean vector. It supports basic vector arithmetic and methods for video games and procedural generation.

        Normalizes this vector.
        Returns:

      • lerp

        public GeoVector lerp​(GeoVector targ,
                      double percent)
        Linearly interpolates between this and a target vector.
        Parameters:
        targ - The target vector.
        percent - The fraction from this to the target.
        Returns:
        A vector pointing to the lerped location.
